attributes.title: don’t get this app
attributes.review: i was really looking into supporting my orange amigo here but this app really just made me look the other way. The app took so long to download and on top of that it literally did not help me whatsoever. Not supporting and never will 😤

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app is worse than herpes... that says a lot. It crashes uncontrollably and even threatened to take my health care away if I didn’t allow notifications. -12 out of 5 on yelp.

attributes.title: This app is butty cheeks😌
attributes.review: It took 5 years to download and then made my phone freeze for another 10 years don’t get it it also makes your phone glitch

attributes.title: terrible app 🤢
attributes.review: once the app was downloaded i cannot believe how horrible it was 😭 the app started showing cryptic messages and began chanting like it was a cult! it summoned Lucifer himself, no disrespect on my homie king of demons 😌💅. this app is shameful to the USA and the underworld 😡 Lucifer will not be held back for how hurtful this app is 😭😭 😍💫💫💖

attributes.title: Less than one star
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking I could learn more about our lord and savior. But after much digging I realize that he is the literal antichrist and I hope that people wake up smell the sulfur in the air.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this was the worst app i’ve ever downloaded, it took forever to download for some dumb reason and made my phone glitch. it’s overall a terrible app to get just in general and i do not recommend at all.

attributes.title: The orange man revenge
attributes.review: this app is so terrible I don’t have word to describe I never want to see it again my phone was so laggy and glitched at least over 2,500 times in the last minute. And not to mention the ugly Donald orange man on it🙄

attributes.title: Don’t recommend!!!!!
attributes.review: Don’t get this app.. I got this app to learn more about my are president it took a week to download. It also gave my phone viruses and my phone keeps glitching I recommend you do not get this app!!!!

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: App was a complete waste of my time. When I entered the app my phone started glitching out. Then the FBI broke through the window of my room. I had to buy a whole new phone and a new window.

attributes.title: Worst app every
attributes.review: This app was so stupid. It was glitching my phone none stop and had a whole bunch of pictures of a orange dot. I was so scared of it that I tried to delete it but it wouldn’t delete. Pls never get this app
